channel.title: I've always thought this would be a good idea
channel.description:
I've been thinking about talking to my schools IT department about setting up a forum for all the students and teachers to use with their usernames and accounts. I don't know if it has been done in any of your schools, but I think this could work and help improve student/teacher relations (through help boards ect), student/student relations (boards to talk about general crap) and then private teacher/teacher boards ect.
is this a good idea? have you seen it implemented anywhere else?
